articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: ‘Not acceptable’: PM Modi talks tough against temple vandalism in Australia - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Prime Minister was addressing a public gathering in Delhi after he arrived in the national capital from a three-nation visit on Thursday. | Latest News India
articles.content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi talked tough against temple vandalisation incidents in Australia and said that the world agrees with him when he says the attack on pilgrimage sites is not acceptable. He… [+1366 chars]
